mapper.insert: insert into resume(resume_name, employee_id, resume_image, highschool_name, highschool_startdate, highschool_enddate, highschool_major, univ_name, univ_startdate, univ_enddate, univ_major, univ_grades, prev_co, career_period, career_position, career_department, career_task, job_id, is_main, created_at) VALUES(#{resumeName}, #{employeeId}, #{resumeImage}, #{highschoolName}, #{highschoolStartdate}, #{highschoolEnddate}, #{highschoolMajor}, #{univName}, #{univStartdate}, #{univEnddate}, #{univMajor}, #{univGrades}, #{prevCo}, #{careerPeriod}, #{careerPosition}, #{careerDepartment}, #{careerTask}, #{jobId}, false, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_name, r.resume_name, r.career_period, j.job_name FROM resume r JOIN employee e ON r.employee_id=e.employee_id JOIN job j ON r.job_id=j.job_id ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT e.employee_name, r.resume_name, r.career_period, j.job_name FROM resume r JOIN employee e ON r.employee_id=e.employee_id JOIN job j ON r.job_id=j.job_id WHERE j.job_code = #{jobCode} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT r.resume_name, r.employee_id, r.resume_image, r.highschool_name, r.highschool_startdate, r.highschool_enddate, r.highschool_major, r.univ_name, r.univ_startdate, r.univ_enddate, r.univ_major, r.univ_grades, r.prev_co, r.career_period, r.career_position, r.career_department, r.career_task, r.job_id, r.is_main, r.created_at, e.employee_name employee_name, e.employee_birth employee_birth, e.employee_sex employee_sex, e.employee_email employee_email, e.employee_tel employee_tel, e.employee_location employee_location FROM resume r LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON r.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId}
